definition: to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: The patient individualizes commonly blemish, psychogenic disorder duration is in less than of half an year.
sentences.chinese: 病人一般有个性缺陷，心理障碍持续时间在半年以内。

sentences.english: A few abilities have had the duration of the secondary effects extended, such as Dragon's Talon.
sentences.chinese: 一些技能的附加效果持续时间被延长，如巨龙钩爪。

sentences.english: There is no need to reapply it for several hours which makes it also long lasting.
sentences.chinese: 持续时间很长，不需要每隔几个小时就涂一次。

sentences.english: The duration of the spaceplane's first mission isn't being announced.
sentences.chinese: 该航天飞机的第一个任务持续时间不被公布。

sentences.english: Mage Armor no longer reduces the duration of beneficial magic buffs .
sentences.chinese: 法师护甲不再降低任何有益魔法的持续时间。

sentences.english: Finland is also home to the world's longest-running rock festival, Ruisrock.
sentences.chinese: 芬兰还是世界上持续时间最长的摇滚节的发源地。

sentences.english: The occurrent time and duration of severe arrhythmia were observed.
sentences.chinese: 以严重心律失常的发生时间和持续时间为观察指标。

sentences.english: Because the present use's vaccine protects the strength to be limited, the duration is short.
sentences.chinese: 由于目前使用的菌苗保护力有限，持续时间较短。

sentences.english: Road Flare duration increased from 2 minutes to 4 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 道路照明弹的持续时间从2分钟增加到4分钟。

sentences.english: Lowered maximum duration for which Hirelings could be stunned.
sentences.chinese: 在持续时间中雇佣工能是目瞪口呆的降低最大。

sentences.english: Increases the duration of Battle Rage, Battle Cry, and Ignore Pain by X%.
sentences.chinese: 增加X%战斗狂怒，战嗥和忽略痛苦的持续时间。

sentences.english: Three-year-olds have very short attention spans.
sentences.chinese: 三岁大的孩子的注意力持续时间很短。

sentences.english: The latest minimum was particularly weak and long- lasting.
sentences.chinese: 而最近的太阳活动谷年就尤其微弱且持续时间较久。

sentences.english: Prospective studies have variably adjusted for relevant confounders and have been of relatively limited duration.
sentences.chinese: 前瞻性研究调整了相关混杂性设计和限制了持续时间。

sentences.english: Heavy rains have already caused more than 2 weeks of record flooding.
sentences.chinese: 暴雨所导致的史上最大洪水持续时间已经超过了两周。

sentences.english: And the durations of strobilation and the release of ephyrae would be shorter.
sentences.chinese: 横裂周期及碟状体释放周期持续时间越短。

definition: gap/interval/compartment/to divide/to separate/to leave a gap of (two weeks, three meters etc)
to delay/to postpone/to keep putting sth off/to procrastinate/(computing) to lag
to fire/to discharge/to release (fireworks, smokescreen, poison gas, virus etc)
to stop in the middle of sth/intermittent/intermittence
Yanchang county in Yan'an 延安[Yan2 an1], Shaanxi
